post-7.title: assertTrue() in Java: A Complete Tutorial
post-7.description: Assertions are an important part of the automation testing process, ensuring the software functions as anticipated. If it is not working as desired, the tests have to be marked as failure and need to be halted to make the necessary investigation for the failure.
